Articles.Content:
> 
> this still happens?
> remove the gamedata/realism overhaul folder from your game please if your not using the full realism overhaul mod.
> 
> infact this is no longer part of the mod and must be downloaded separate for RO users ONLY

I do have Realism Overhaul though.
hmmm. can you send me your ksp.log file so I can see the cause?
Mike-NZ can you make the Soyuz progress a KIS Container?
Updating Realism Overhaul manually fixed it apparently.
would of still liked to find the cause of the error. so far I have not received detailed error reports from anyone. without it people may still get this bug if they have the same setup you had

Apparently I forgot to add the RO patch to the new Realism Overhaul install and it broke it again. Well then.

[Log](https://www.dropbox.com/s/tnvoqbd8k5ucxrt/output_log.txt?dl=0)

so youre saying if you don't add my ro patch to realism overhaul it doesn't work?

- - - Updated - - -

not much in that, other than infernal robotics issues.

when it freezes the info I need will be in here:

![BzL5HQZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/BzL5HQZ.png)

- - - Updated - - -

typically the last entry in the log will be the issue, and what it got stuck on
Well, back to square one for me. After attaching three pieces of the JEM arm, when I went back to load the game... the station shook itself apart. :'(

but thanks for helping out. will spend time on the iss tomorrow and back to the shuttle the day after maybe.

work through those issues posted page 28.

night

I don't know what it was. I just went to the tracking station and saw "Bob Kerman debris". I loaded it to see the JEM arm pieces floating free, and a moment later, what was one station was suddenly lots of pieces. From what I could tell, only Zarya, Zvesda and Unity survived intact...

I think it's probably something in KAS that's doing it. Things were going well until I added those pieces on orbit.

Ok I will have a look.

As an experiment can you move the mir\_core.cfg out of its folder and onto your desktop. Im guessing it will freeze on the next item on the list.

If not I know its JUST mir\_core

I will look through your log when I am home anyway.

But it shouldn't be doing this.
I tried and you're right. Loading freezes on other part. This makes all components of Sovietpack which are parts of ISS pack

Have you guys downloaded the realism overhaul and real fuels from page one or through ckan or other sources. I want to try to recreate it. Almost at my pc. Couple of hours...

Sorry for this. These configs are left mostly as I have recieved them.

I will be modifying stock iss and the ro configs.

Strange how it always works on my install.
I installed RO and all recommended mods over CKAN
Ok thanks for the info. I will do the same and find the causes of the errors
Can you fix the Ariane 5 rocket the engine goes on backwards and the fairing doesnt fit on the nodes

> 
> Can you fix the Ariane 5 rocket the engine goes on backwards and the fairing doesnt fit on the nodes

yes can do. thanks for letting me know

The freezing seems to be caused by a unused resource.

The parts have [Asmi's ECLSS life support mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58127-0-23-asmi-s-ECLSS-Mod-%28current-version-1-0-15%29-Life-Support-Mod) integrated. Removing those modules should fix it.

what I figured is: the cfg's are ok, but when you apply my ISS RO config is freezes right?

so not sure if I should remove entries from stock cfg if I don't need to.

give me a few moments...

ok so n204 fuel does not exist in real fuels list. if it did, it doesn't now.

im not sure what these Russian fuels were in real life but I will change it out to something else for now
I tested the robotic arms for station. The arms themselves work fine, but the magnets on JEM and RMS(Canadarm2) don't work. I haven't tested the shuttle arm yet though.
